title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 19.3 - Agreement controlling and determinative
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 19.3 - Agreement controlling and determinative

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Motor Vehicles and the commissioner of
finance further agree that this agreement shall be exclusively controlling and
determinative of the respective authorities, responsibilities, duties and
obligations, and liabilities of the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles and the
commissioner of finance, with respect to the collection, administration, custody, remittal, and enforcement of the tax as imposed by the city of New

York pursuant to the local law. In furtherance of such, the Commissioner of

Motor Vehicles and the commissioner of finance further agree as follows: (a) The responsibilities, duties and
obligations of the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles with respect to the
collection, administration, custody, remittal, and enforcement of the tax as
otherwise provided in this agreement, are as contained in a "Plan of

Operations", Appendix 1,infra. (b) The commissioner of finance shall have the sole responsibilities, duties, obligations and authorities, as are contained in Appendix 2,infra. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
19.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
